Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: reesenunn
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR camera and I love it.  I did extensive research before purchasing the T3 and could not be more pleased.  This kit is the best price on the market and it shipped very fast.  The camera took amazing pictures right out of the box.  I have two kids and the quick shutter speed is perfect when they can't/won't sit still.  The action shots are crisp and high quality as well.  I rarely use the flash even for indoor shots.  The auto mode increases the ISO level and makes the pictures look soft and beautiful.I also read Digital SLR for dummies and picked up some great tips on how to make my amateur pictures look professional.  I would highly recommend the T3 and the value kit.

Reviews.Title: Great except...
Reviews.Author: ThePinkFloyd
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware!  The camera bag in the picture is not the camera bag that you receive with this product.  The bag that you receive is much smaller and can barely fit the camera with just the one lens.That being said... this is a great package.  It's worth it just for the camera, the tripod (which is nice), the memory card, and the extra battery.  I paid the extra 10 bucks for shipping and it arrived the next day so that was awesome.Bottom line: great package, but the bag sucks.  Be prepared to buy a different bag and factor that price into your decision.JB

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Okay Accessories
Reviews.Author: JohnnyRem
Reviews.Content: First and foremost I ordered this item on a Friday and It came the following Monday, so shipping was excellent!The camera in itself, the Canon EOS Rebel T3(1100D) is an exceptional camera for everyday and professional use.  It has the capabilities of shooting with an Iso from 100 to 6400, it is comfortable to hold, very lightweight due to the hard plastic design, and the user interface is very easy to navigate.The accessories, some good some bad. The SD Card is a 16 GB SDHC class 10, which is a very nice card, plenty of space when shooting just in Jpeg 12 Mp, it gives you well over 2000 pictures to take. The memory card reader is nice if you don't have an SD card slot on your PC.  The Hdmi cord is a nice accessory but when I used it, it seemed to cause static noise on the picture on my hd tv. The tripod is an ok built tripod, when fully extended the lower legs are very thin and feel flimsy so take precaution when using this outdoors or near children.  The bag definitely seems small, but It manages to fit the camera, an 18-55 MM lens that comes with it, and a 50 MM lens.  I do recommend any user to purchase the Canon 50 MM F/1.8 lens. It is definitely a lens to have handy and its only around 100 dollars. As far as the lcd screen protectors, you have to cut it yourself to fit to the screen and they were really blotchy and bad when put on, so definitely pick up different ones or none at all if you take care of your equipment.  Comes with an extra battery which is definitely handy when out and about.  The table top tripod is actually really cool!  Its so compact and structurally very well built.  The memory card wallet is a nice addition too, not the best, a little tight, but definitely also comes in handy.Overall- For the price that you get the Canon T3 with 18-55 MM lens, this is definitely a great pick up for anyone who is interested in getting a D-SLR and starting something new.  This was hands down one of the better kits that the site has to offer for its price. But like I mentioned, picking up the Canon 50 MM f/1.8 along with this kit will make it worth your while!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 + 18-55mm + Deluxe Accessory Kit = AMAZING
Reviews.Author: alaskablue2
Reviews.Content: This purchase is perfect for a beginning or amateur photographer and includes everything who is ready to start the digital world of photography. I'm a college student who is just starting a major in photography and this is going to be perfect for a starter camera. The Canon T3 camera is very light weight and perfect for on the go life styles. One of my favorite things in the deluxe accessory kit is the camera bag because it fits everything that you get in the kit (except for the tripod, but that has its own case with a handle) and much more!

Reviews.Title: Extremely Please with the Package Deal
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Mulchahey
Reviews.Content: After searching for information over the internet and buying a copy of Consumer Reports for a Digital SLR Camera for around $500, were down to a few different models. I looked here on Amazon for pricing and feature information as well.  We then went to Best Buy to physically look, touch, try the cameras and see their pricing (They couldn't match what we found on Amazon).  We decided on the package deal for the Cannon EOS Rebel T3 (Couldn't see spending $200 more for 6 more megapixels and a lower scoring view finder for the T3i)We ordered on a Saturday evening, all items arrived on Wednesday (Well before the estimated time).  Some of the reviews remarked poorly about the camera bag; I can only assume due to those remarks the package has been upgraded as the camera bag has plenty of room and appears to be very well made.We were amazed at the quality of photographs this camera was taking!  The ability to have control over various functions or allow the auto-settings to have control is very nice.  The auto-setting seem to be very intuitive for the environment, subject, and whether there is motion involved.Bottom line - for the price this is a very good camera, the package deal made it all that better, and it was still less expensive than just the camera itself at Best Buy.

Reviews.Title: Comfortable and intuitive
Reviews.Author: Danielle Neithercutt
Reviews.Content: I researched digital SLRs for just about a year before deciding on the Rebel T3, knowing it was probably going to be the last camera I ever bought.My requirements were it had to have a quick start-up, take crisp and clear low-light pictures and video and most of all, it had to be comfortable in my small-ish hands.  I've been actively shooting for about a month and have caught some excellent shots of my grandchildren's soccer games and gymnastics meets.  The T3 can stop the action and I have some excellent panning shots.  The controls are intuitive for the most part and once I started using it, I quickly became comfortable switching between automatic, movie, sports shots and manual modes.I'm pleased with this purchase and have recommended it to my daughter as she is now looking for a digital SLR.

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous photos!
Reviews.Author: spiryt
Reviews.Content: I took this camera out from the box, inserted the battery and started taking pictures!  Talk about amazing looking photos without touching a thing or opening the manual.  When I did refer to the manual I preferred the DVD that came packaged with the camera instead of using the booklet.  A perfect camera for a beginner with some impressive results.The tripod, camera bag, and everything else that came packaged with this deal is perfect.  I love it all!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase.
Reviews.Author: Brie
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews of others for literally a month before buying this bundle, I was aware of the flimsy tripod, small bag, and other products that aren't that good. So when my package finally arrived, on time, I was not shocked or disappointed. Although I must say, the tripod, if lengthened, yes the legs become flimsy and are weak. I wouldn't trust my camera on it. If you can use the tripod only at the base of 21' then it's very durable, I feel. I love it. The bag came a little dusty but nothing a few gentle cloth rubs couldn't get rid of. The bag isn't small to me, it is the bag that you see in the description picture and it has room for the camera, two lens, batteries, charging station, and a little more. I love it. I am worried about the top of the bag, the main part holding the camera and my lens, because there is no zipper to secure it, only the clamps. But as long as you're careful, you wont have a problem with this. I might be buying a more secure bag in the future but no time soon. All the products that are listed came with my camera and they are in good shape from what I can see. I have only had my camera bundle for 5 days now. I have used it but I am still a beginner so I am learning the ropes as the days go by. The camera itself and the lens are amazing! I am so very happy with this purchase overall and will be buying more lens in the near future for my camera. I would probably buy from Focus Camera again if I see a good bundle for lens.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: R. DeMille
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera almost 2 years ago and it's still working great! This package comes with so much and is such a great deal. The best thing about the camera is just how easy it is to use. I don't know a lot about taking pictures, but it's such a great camera that I am able to take some fantastic shots! I have had people ask me to take their family pictures since I do such a great job, but it's really not me...it's the camera! I know several others who bought the same camera and they love it too. Definitely get this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Emma Sand
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this value set. I snatched it up as soon as it hit the price that I thought was reasonable (after tracking it for months!) I use it on all my travels exploring up and down the West Coast. I would highly recommend this camera for its easy to use instructions, price, reputation, and craftsmanship. It comes with a one year warranty that you should definitely sign up for. I am by no means a pro at photography but this is a perfect camera for those dipping their feet into the realm of photography. You can upgrade later when you get the hang of what you want and need to meet your demands. Verdict: Great for beginners at a price that pays off.

Reviews.Title: Delux Accessory Kit not so Delux
Reviews.Author: Jersey Girl
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera and Deluxe Accessory Kit for our honeymoon.  The camera works well, just as you would expect a Canon product. However, the Accessory kit is a completely different matter. The Camera bag sholder strap  broke within 1 week of use. This was due to the cheap plastic that attached the strap to the bag. After "fixing" the attachment with a metal link, the latch that holds the bag then broke. At this point I'm wondering what is so "DELUXE" about this accessory kit.  I would not recommend the accessory kit, you would be much better purchasing a quality bag separately. We were very disappointed in the quality.

Reviews.Title: Great start for a dslr beginner
Reviews.Author: Nmllwnimi
Reviews.Content: Good Set, cant really complain. I pretty much used everything. You can get getter better quality stuff, but for a much higher cost. And I am a very amateur photographer, I only use it for my fashion blog, so the pros might say otherwise. The tripod is really cheap and shaky, I get scared of setting my camera on it, thinking it will fall. It hasnt yet, but I still get nervous using it. The case is also decent.If you are a beginner with dslr, I think the camera is a great start.

Reviews.Title: Camera and accessary kit
Reviews.Author: Lauren Lindeman
Reviews.Content: I love the camera so far! But to it out in the camera bag for the first time this weekend and one of the prongs on the closure fastener broke off. I would love to get a replacement bag!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Bre
Reviews.Content: This kit is super nice. It was all nice. It was great product and well worth the cost. To be honest it is most likely worth more. It takes GREAT pictures and easy to learn.

Reviews.Title: Good lil' camera
Reviews.Author: Jc
Reviews.Content: Overall the T3 is an excellent choice for beginner dslr shooters.  It has several of the options offered on its bigger brothers but not so many you are overwhelmed.  It is serving me well as I learn more about photography in general.  The kit lens is solid for the price point.  If you are a budget minded beginner this is a great first choice.- Great for beginners- Fairly impressive options for this price pointThe cons of this camera are few but somewhat significant as you gain skill.  The camera begins to show some of its limitations.1. The screen.  The screen on this camera is fairly low quality.  I didn't think this would be a big deal but it turns out it is.  The problem you run into is that you take a pic, look at the result on the screen and it looks pretty good.  But then when you get back to your computer it turns out the image is fairly blurry.  Viewing in the sun is also fairly difficult.  Another big thing with the screen is lack of touch control.  You have to manually cycle through your options (WB, AF, FLASH, etc.)  This makes it difficult if you want to shoot things in quick order.2. Focus points.  The focus points on the camera are hard to see in bright situations.3. Continuous shooting.  The camera seems to do an ok job shooting continuous in jpeg mode but if you are needing something that can shoot raw in continuous this camera has some limitations.  It simply doesn't have the processing power to continuously shoot raw.  This should be expected in this price point though.

Reviews.Title: More than I could have imagined.
Reviews.Author: T. J. Jones "ImaginaryFlowersUSA"
Reviews.Content: I had been wanting a digital Canon for a lot of years.  I got one of the first Olympus digital SLRs and it was impressive.  Then I got a Kodak HD video and still camera. It too was impressive, but nothing is quite like this Canon or any Canon for that matter. I have had Canon printers and scanners.  I am Canon crazy!I will never need my old FD Canon again. With the adapter I bought here on Amazon I have already taken a picture with my FD macro lens.XCSOURCE Mount Adapter For Canon FD FL Lens to EF DSLR Camera Canon EOS 5D Mark 5D2 5D3 6D 7D 70D 60D 700D 650D 1100D 1000D 600D 50D 550D 500D 40D 30D 350D 400D 450D 30D 10D 100D Rebel XS T5i T4i T3i T2i T1i T4 T3 DC328This adapter is meant to be used with a macro lens and only in manual mode.  There are other adapters that have a glass in it.  All this does  is connect the EOS body to the FD macro lens and it has no glass. This means it is like an extension tube. But still the body of EOS does not directly connect to FD lens either.The accessories with this kit were more than anyone could ever want and the kit was only $10.00 more than the usual camera kit. This is truly a huge savings. 2 batteries! While one is charging the other can be used.  I was amazed, because I usually end up buying a lot of accessories every time I get a camera. The memory card works great. The tripod is as nice as the one I paid over 50 dollars for in 1999. The tripod has a level on it too with a carrying case. The bag looks nice but I haven't put the camera away long enough to use the bag yet.I have not yet even had to charge either battery that came with the camera. I haven't used the flash a lot either. I am not sure how long the batteries last if you have to use the flash.The lens that came with the camera is great! The lens with the camera also does close ups of beautiful flowers and jewelry. I don't even know why I am so hooked on my macro lens, because it is not even necessary to get close up pictures.

Reviews.Title: Amazing deal
Reviews.Author: FAITH FULL "FAITH"
Reviews.Content: I had this in my wishlist for a while, and one day i saw that the price dropped to 399.00. Needless to say i jumped on it. I'm glad I did. The issue with the carrying case is non existent, as It is a good quality bag. All the accessories are good quality.

Reviews.Title: great!!
Reviews.Author: Tyler Averett
Reviews.Content: Great camera!!! Very happy with it, but wish I splurged a little and got the T3i. But over all still very happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a newbie
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth McCormick
Reviews.Content: This is my first DSLR and so I was a little nervous jumping into the higher price not really knowing what I was doing. That said, I got an amazing deal on this set and am very pleased with the quality of photos the camera takes and how reasonably intuitive it is.  I bought the kit and found the DVD moves way too quick with the information. For me that was kind of useless. It was far easier to watch a few YouTube videos and figure out the set up and basic functions.  I read a few negative comments about the cheapness of the bag. I have no gripes about it. It's an average canvas bag with plastic clips and nice padding to keep the camera safe.  I appreciate that for less than $450 I got a camera, back up battery, decent carrying bag, 59" tripod, and 16G flash drive. It's an amazing deal for a really great camera. I would definitely  recommend it for any beginner to DSLR's.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Miss Online Shopper
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it is perfect for someone who just wants to take great pictures and wants a fast click. I mainly use this to take pictures of my very busy toddler and it's fast and captures the shot. It is also very east to use and I recommend this product to anyone looking for a SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mr. T
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a gift for someone practicing photography and they're enjoying it. This camera takes professional grade photos at a great price. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great kit
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: This item arrived promptly from the seller.  I was very pleased with this kit.  I ran right out and purchased other items such a circular polarized lens filter to help take better photos and it also protects the camera lens.  The lens filter costs around $50.00.  If you were to replace the entire lens due to a scratch on the camera lens it will cost you a couple of hundred dollars.  I would recommend purchasing a polarized lens filter and a high speed memory card.  Overall one great kit!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Teagan Raher
Reviews.Content: My equipment came in great shape and I have really enjoyed using it as a beginning photographer. It has all the equipment a new photographer would need to get started.

Reviews.Title: Great for a first DSL Camara! Great pictures!
Reviews.Author: Kay S. Walsh
Reviews.Content: This Cannon EOS Rebel T3 is an economical choice for the person exploring going beyond a point and shoot camera. Currently, this bundle is the same price as just the camera and lens, so it's a great deal!I've had mine for several years now. I still seldom go beyond the automatic settings but love the fact there is no "lag" after pressing the button. I've taken it to several photo workshops to learn. The camera had all the controls I needed to learn and practice.Most of the time I leave my setting on the "runner" setting instead of "auto" This works well even indoors. The flash will lift up if needed but most of the time, I can take good indoor pictures without the flash.I recommend buying the next size up lens if you like to take shots from far away.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Duane Pantanella
Reviews.Content: Great camera for the novice.  We are learning more everyday and this camera delivers.  Thanks for all the previous reviews.

Reviews.Title: Better than discount I could got where I work!!
Reviews.Author: Felipe
Reviews.Content: HelloIf you forget what I said just remember this: Buy It! (If you are a beginner, its a great deal)Okay so I work at a electronics store and after researching which camera makes a great entry level DSLR I chose this one cause ofprice, and all the other goodies they give you. I could not even get this good of a deal where I work and I sell this camera.About the Bag almost everyone is saying bad things about. I liked the one I have its really good they give me a premium bag its not cheaply made. The Extra battery and all.It gets better I thought they were going to give me a knock off SDHC Card but NO! They gave me a sony card SDHC these are more expensive! Now UNDERSTAND that this seller probably gives you what ever they have available at the moment I guess they just happen to have the better accessories when I purchased.As far as the camera its Great it takes the best pics for entry level. The lens is good for close ups but you need to get another one for pics that are farther away...Overall extremely satisfied. Its Sad places like this takes away the business of the retail place where I work, but hey it was a bargain.Thanks for reading!!P.S. I hope my boss does not see this...

Reviews.Title: Everything but the case
Reviews.Author: Hill Runner
Reviews.Content: My mom and a couple of my aunts are really into their DSLR cameras, and so I finally decided to take the plunge myself.  This is my first SLR, and I couldn't be happier with it!  The only thing I didn't really care for about this bundle was the camera case.  There is no zipper on the main pocket.  It's just a couple buckles holding a flap down.  I want something that's more secure.  I went with the Case Logic SLRC-202 medium SLR camera bag.  I like the zipper placement for the lenses and the hammock suspension system.  Also, It's not as bulky as this bag.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: richard demastus
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the package price.  Would have liked to have the additional lens needed for distant shots {55-250/300}. Overall pleased

Reviews.Title: Cannon Rebel T-3
Reviews.Author: jlhanchey
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my honey and she loves it, it takes a little time to get familiar with all the features it has, great camera.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Allen Whitmore
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the camera and the accessories, excluding the memory card reader. I plugged my memory card reader in and inserted my SD card and it would open and close by itself. I had to download some recovery software to get the pictures off my SD card. I recommend everything except for the card reader.With that being said, it was a great purchase and the quality and amount of things you get in the bundle beat all the competition out there.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Johnson
Reviews.Content: The T3 is a really good camera the picture quality is good easy to use, if you have another EOS camera its is much the same.

Reviews.Title: Great gift for my Wife!!
Reviews.Author: JAMES PEARCE
Reviews.Content: Great value, This is not a cheap set. My wife  has been taking pictures since she got it. She loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Performs beyond expectations
Reviews.Author: David Miller
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera.  It was a gift for my son who is a missionary in Honduras.  He uses the camera to update his website and facebook page. He raves about the quality of the pictures.  HIs site is: [...]

Reviews.Title: Meets and exceeds my expectations.
Reviews.Author: Jarrett
Reviews.Content: I've had a little experience with DSLR's in my past but mostly recreational. I was a member of my high school yearbook staff and had the opportunity to use the Nikon DSLR that was provided for use by the class for school events and such, but that was the majority of my hands on experience with them. I had done plenty of research and for many years now have been wanting to buy my own but never had the money, and I now finally decided to purchase the Rebel T3. Years ago I had been looking at the Rebel XSi line and further research today still kept me on the track of buying Canon. The seller provided very fast shipping and the camera was here in no time. Upon taking everything out of the box, I noticed some of the products are not as pictured, but all work as intended. I received a Lexar brand 16GB SDHC card (a reputable brand in flash memory), and the majority of the other accessories were Zeikos brand. The USB card reader doesn't seem to work with my laptop so I'm not sure if it is defective or just conflicts with my hardware (the ports are all USB 3.0 and despite being backwards compatible, they do tend to sprout issues with legacy devices), but everything else works well. The tripod included (Zeikos brand) seems a little flimsy but it is lightweight and will do the job well for now just starting out into photography.The camera is incredible for someone just coming into DSLR photography and I highly recommend it. The price point is unbeatable for the quality you get. I've already taken some amazing shots with it. Far beyond impressed.

Reviews.Title: So happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Mallorie Corinne "Future Mrs. Fig"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this and it came two days later! I was so happy. Everything that was described was in the packaging and the camera performs beautifully. I manage a photography studio and we use the canon 40D, I love the T3. It is great to start out on my own with.

Reviews.Title: great camera accesories better then expected
Reviews.Author: P. D. Wasch "p.d. Walsh"
Reviews.Content: Gadget bag much better then reviews indicate. lots of room for  extra lenses and options.camera was purchased for pictures of first grand child and portrait style pics were great . vacation pics could use a longer lens but that's a future purchase not a need. great buy at a short notice type decision also amazon prime two day delivery was great to have.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS rebel t3 DSLR
Reviews.Author: Mike Z.
Reviews.Content: This is a great kit for the money.  I wasn't aware that this is an entry level kit, and the camera doesn't act like an entry level camera.  I get great photos from it and I'm very happy with it.  The tripod included in the kit isn't very sturdy though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Georgia.Kay
Reviews.Content: I spent months pouring over reviews, ratings, and talking with photographers. I went into stores and talked with reps tried out models. I finally decided on the T3. I am excited I did. This kit sets you up and you don't have to do extra shopping for the extras. I love the case.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Bundle
Reviews.Author: LiveDarkness
Reviews.Content: This bundle is definitely worth it. First off the camera takes amazing photos right out the box. The spare battery and SD cards are a must. And the case is able to hold every bit of it. I would definitely recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: jgorno
Reviews.Content: We wanted a "point and shoot" camera for pictures of the kids and this exceeds all of our expectations.  Very clear, nice pictures with many features for any type of lighting or action shots.  Also the kit included a very large amount of extras including an extra battery, which is very convenient when dealing with rechargeable batteries because you can't simply put in new disposable batteries.  We are very happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Camera is very good but don't buy the kit
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: Camera is very good,  but don't buy the kit, go with just a camera. What you see in the Product Description and what you get might be different.

Reviews.Title: A little sad
Reviews.Author: R. R. Santizo "Amazonico"
Reviews.Content: i live in Guatemala Central America, and a friend of my sendme the camera kit. I received it yesterday, but note that the camera bag is no like the image, i'll buy the filters, wide angle and other extras and think that i can use this camera bag, but is not the same, so Zeemo, change the picture, don't lie the people, thanks! Letme put the hands on to the camera and write a review abou it.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Kit
Reviews.Author: Mace
Reviews.Content: Honestly haven't used it enough to really review properly but kit included everything a beginner would need and then some. I saw complaints about the camera bag, but mine was a Vivitar and everything fit in it nicely. The tripod is nicer than I expected. There were a few items included in my kit that weren't listed, which was a pleasant suprise. Very happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: great camera with lots of accessories
Reviews.Author: J Mac
Reviews.Content: great bargain for excellent product - camera takes incredible photos.  one small issue - the strap for the camera bag was a little flimsy as the hook broke when I went to attach to the bag.  otherwise, no complaints

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Allison Chastain
Reviews.Content: Quick shipping, well packaged, great bundle!  The case is great for a starter, no idea why people were complaining!  The accessories are fantastic, and the camera itself if pretty  user friendly, in this case the "user"  needs to be educated a bit but a great starter DSLR cam with beautiful pic quality!

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: CORONEL
Reviews.Content: The product is good and the delivery was smoothThe cost benefit was excellentHighly recommend for those who want a good product for a reasonable value

Reviews.Title: Don't hesitate
Reviews.Author: amy o.
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera (and the many accessories) for some time now. I was hesitant to purchase because the deal sounded too good to be true, I ordered anyway and sooner than expected, it arrived. It comes in a huge box with all the fixings.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Rikki
Reviews.Content: I love my camera, it takes photos very well and everything that was suppose to be included was there. Delivery was quick as well.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Happy Customer
Reviews.Content: Great value! I was very pleased with this package purchase! All of the contents were exactly as advertised- everything was packaged properly as well!

Reviews.Title: The pictures it takes are amazing. Even screen shots are clear
Reviews.Author: B. McMillan "Fifi"
Reviews.Content: This camera has everything you need for a photo shoot. The pictures it takes are amazing. Even screen shots are clear !  Love it

Reviews.Title: awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Luiz Penna
Reviews.Content: The price and quality on the camera and everything on the package is very good and I'm very happy with them .

Reviews.Title: Great camera horrible battery
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because a few if my friends have it and love it. I love how easy it is to use and it takes great pictures. My only complaint is that the battery that comes with it and the additional only hold charge for 10 minutes and than die!

Reviews.Title: ... around with the camera but am so far very happy. Everything arrived in great shape as advertised
Reviews.Author: Ryan C. Taylor
Reviews.Content: I have only had a few days to play around with the camera but am so far very happy. Everything arrived in great shape as advertised.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Brenda Rice
Reviews.Content: i bought the camera as a graduation gift for my daughter. She uses it almost daily, really likes the camera. The tripod seems a little cheaply made tho. Overall we are happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Totally AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Becky Maestas
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time, no problems! I saw the same camera at a club store and was priced twice as much for just the camera. I think it's a little obvious as to why I purchased this one instead! Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Blue Sapphire
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift and my friend has received numerous compliments about this camera. The tripod is not used much but overall a great product. Takes great pictures. I have purchased another since this one- nearly the exact model. The first was lost in a hurricane.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: kenroy morgan
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this camera by accident and I'm glad I did. thought it was the T3i lol. Great Camera.

Reviews.Title: Five stars - great bundle
Reviews.Author: JaimeTr1
Reviews.Content: This is a great bundle pack for the beginner photographer. We use this for our everyday activities. The quality is good, and the ease of use is great!

Reviews.Title: I am delighted with this camera
Reviews.Author: Maryelit
Reviews.Content: I am delighted with this camera. I liked very much. Both the camera and its accessories arrived in perfect condition. As described and all arrived. The camera takes stunning photos and videos. The functions are available in all languages. And highly recommend the seller. Greetings from Venezuela

Reviews.Title: Great for getting started
Reviews.Author: John "John"
Reviews.Content: I've had a chance to play with it for about a week now and have been completely satisfied.  For anyone just getting into photography this is not only a great camera to start with but it also comes with just about everything you need.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: bought this for my son for Christmas.  He is an amateur photographer and uses it all the time.  One thing about the kit, the tripod is cheap and flimsy. It broke within a week. For all you get and the price it still wasn't a bad deal.

Reviews.Title: What an awesome DEAL. Over $500 worth of items for just $400.
Reviews.Author: Michael Brindle
Reviews.Content: The camera kit includes everything you need to start shooting amazing pictures. You receive more than $100 worth of accessories basically for FREE. The entire kit is just $400, yet most places sell the camera alone for more than $450. Do yourself a favor if you are looking to purchase a camera, BUY THIS!

Reviews.Title: A Steal!
Reviews.Author: Kelli Tilbury
Reviews.Content: For the price of the general camera kit at a store you get so much extra stuff! Great price, good quality accesories. The camera itself has great battery life and takes clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera A+ Service
Reviews.Author: Lydia Ryckman
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome price for a camera that I have wanted for a very long time. everything is "As Described". I have no problem fitting the camera in the bag provided. and the lens cleaner is great. I wouldn't use the tripod that comes with it. it is flimsy but big deal. still a great deal for the camera. thank you!!

Reviews.Title: Camera great, issue with tripod.
Reviews.Author: Gerren Fisher
Reviews.Content: The camera has so far worked out very well. Was easy to use enough immediately, which was needed and the accessories were great and useful for an immediate start. That said, the tripod broke (one of the support legs) within two days, which if not for already having one and having already had plans to buy a more professional tripod, would have been a lot more upsetting than it has been. But all in all I'm happy with the purchase and the most important part of things, the camera, appears as if it will more than meet my needs for the future.

Reviews.Title: BEST DEAL
Reviews.Author: lya alvarez
Reviews.Content: I researched all over for the best deal since we live in AK we wanted a camera for the Auroras.. We are so happy with this bundle deal!! we recommended this deal to our friends

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love our camera. It meets all expectations that we had. We are not experienced in photography at all, but this camera makes it very easy to take great photos.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera and accessories
Reviews.Author: Carmen Wichman
Reviews.Content: I am loving this so far. The accessories were well worth the extra money. Everything was as described. Thanks so much!

Reviews.Title: Great starter
Reviews.Author: Theresa M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter who is college and she absolutely loves it.  At first she thought it would be too difficult to use, but it's not.  Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Rafael Alberto Smith
Reviews.Content: What a great bundle at an excellent price...justo what I was looking for lately and it works pretty well for my niece photo shooting in he university class.

Reviews.Title: buy it
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas, well WELL worth it in many ways ;) guys if your looking for a nice camera setup without breaking  bank then this is the product for you.

Reviews.Title: great bundle great price
Reviews.Author: Heather A. McGinnity
Reviews.Content: So far I love it.  My first DLSR camera and I'm overcoming my intimidation.  All around great price for lots of accessories.  I know it's older technology but it takes great pics.

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera
Reviews.Author: cd
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera . So far I have found it very easy to use. I am hoping to learn all the great things that it can do .  I have been wanting to take my camera ability to the next level and so far I am not disappointed .

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: kochong
Reviews.Content: --Its a little more complicating to understand than other canon cameras, but still takes beautiful pictures, and nice videos. I think its a great camera for starters.

Reviews.Title: if your a begginer!
Reviews.Author: MilkMan
Reviews.Content: If your a beginner, def. get this camera! it has all of the essentials you need to start off. i read all the reviews and some people had mentioned that they had received their bags in bad shape. So I was a little bit worried But all my things arrived in one box all in order. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Best Upgrade Ever!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Swauger
Reviews.Content: Everything in this kit got you started! For the price this is the best price you could possibly get with this camera. Look at all the extras as free tokens of appreciation. I paid for this package in less than 2 weeks shooting weddings as a co shooter for a local photographer. It works great in getting those perfect portraits and capturing the small details. Looking to get a bigger lens attachment with this camera so I can shoot outdoor wildlife photos. The tripod camera bag was great for storage and transport when needed and the bag was so easy to transport!... I have lots of individuals inquire on where I got my camera from... Shooting with Kodak and Nikon, hands down I cannot go back to any other product and I will be a Cannon brand photographer for life!!!

Reviews.Title: The extras make it a great deal
Reviews.Author: Brian C
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my son.  I researched many similar setups and the extras made this a great deal.  Perfect start up set for the serious.  Love the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera Great Pictures a Little more to operate than expected
Reviews.Author: David Wood
Reviews.Content: Good Camera Takes great Photos bought it for wife for X Mas she has some issues with operating function otherwise great camera

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I can't tell you about the performance of the camera itself because it was a gift for my daughter. However It came quickly and was packed well, There was everything in that box to make AMAZING photos. I was really impressed. When I buy a new camera it will be from this vender for sure !

Reviews.Title: Great value for the price !
Reviews.Author: Byron Pierce
Reviews.Content: I can not wait to use it on our vacation in Punta Cana. I'm looking forward to the many photos

Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: Lora
Reviews.Content: Wonderful camera for a truly great price.  Our daughter just loves it and just sent  us some pictues and they are beautiful.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: Xiomara Salinas
Reviews.Content: I love the camera everything shown in the picture is as is you couldn't get a Better deal than this

Reviews.Title: Satisfied client
Reviews.Author: Ana Cristina Lara "Ana"
Reviews.Content: The camera works perfectly and has all the instructionss on top of that the set came with a tripod and a bunch of other stuff... I will defenetely buy again!

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: F.W
Reviews.Content: Fantastic value, great camera and awesome additional items (bag, tripod etc.).  Well worth the price in my opinion.  My future photo needs will be handled through Focus.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter DSLR
Reviews.Author: Timothy P. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera and kit for my wife for Christmas; she loves it!  However, the case was pretty disappointing, though everything else was awesome!  Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: very good camera - a dedicated shopper might find this at a slightly better price
Reviews.Author: Paul Carter
Reviews.Content: Everything about the camera itself seems great. Easy to use, well built, good photos.  I believe the extras included in the package (carrying case, tripod, mem card, cleaning kits, etc, inflated the price a bit more than necessary. Nice to have these extras but most will go unused and could have been purchased individually less expensively.  But all in all, very nice camera.  Arrived well packed, and quickly.

Reviews.Title: Excellent SLR intro camera
Reviews.Author: the B man
Reviews.Content: The camera is more than I expected.  I just wanted better pictures and this camera produces them.  I have a lot to learn about photography and this makes it easier.

Reviews.Title: Great DSLR Camera Package Deal
Reviews.Author: Todd
Reviews.Content: This is a great entry level DLSR camera package deal for the price.  This is our first DSLR camera as an upgrade from the old point and shoot digital cameras.  We absolutely love this camera.  Takes great clear pictures and videos.  Add in the Class 10 45MB/S 16 GB SDHC card and this camera is fast.  All of the additional items in the package were just pudding on the cake so to speak.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great package
Reviews.Author: Brian Whorley
Reviews.Content: The Camera and accessories were a gift for my wife who wants to get more involved in photography.  The camera was very easy to use and accessories were great and have already proved to be very useful.  Highly recommend this camera and seller.

Reviews.Title: Great camera package
Reviews.Author: Katt
Reviews.Content: Nice deal, everything as described. Bought it as a gift, arrived as told. The accessories package is well worth it, camera takes nice pix, like the shutter speed.

Reviews.Title: This was an upgrade.
Reviews.Author: Leon E. Haskins "Leeh19"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to upgrade my former Canon Rebel.  This camera works well and all my lens from my other camera fir it.  I take a lot of pictures and always have since I had a 35mm slr prior to digital and tried about 8 different digitals before getting my 1st Canon digital eos camera.  I would recommend this type of camera over the point and shoot ones as there is little or no delay when shooting.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Alessa Jose
Reviews.Content: I can't wait to take more pictures with ths camera..I love it, everyone thinks i'm a professional, lol...But its the best camera i have ever purchased.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: Michael B. McClay
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these for my kids.  The camera base is very similar to one I have been using for several years, this was the first "good" camera for both of them.  The kit provided them with the basics to get started.

Reviews.Title: My father loves the camera!
Reviews.Author: scott kurkjian
Reviews.Content: My father who I would consider a very amateur photographer but avid picture taker is enjoying this easy to use camera.  He is 75 years old and shakes in his hands.  This camera compensates for his lack of steadiness to take outstanding crisp pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Todd Hunkins
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my wife for Christmas and she loves it.  Great camera, especially for the price I paid during Black Friday sales

Reviews.Title: Great Steal
Reviews.Author: Kaiyan
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant on buying this with the mixed reviews but I've had this for over a year now and I don't have any problems with it at all. The camera of course works great and the bag, seems to hold up, but the only bad thing the zipper seems to come off easily but that's just a little thing. The tripod holds the camera well, at first I thought it would be flimsy but it's pretty sturdy. Great if you are just starting off with a DSLR.

Reviews.Title: Quick Delivery and what a great deal
Reviews.Author: Katherine Y. Santiago
Reviews.Content: My daughter has wanted a nice camera for sometime and I have searched and compared prices.  This was a great deal and she absolutely loves the camera.  I have the older version and now I am jealous!  Love that you can see on an LED screen.  The olders ones you can't do that.

Reviews.Title: Nice set but tripod of very poor quality
Reviews.Author: Jacky
Reviews.Content: The camera is Canon so you can't go wrong.  All other parts of the set are very good and of good quality but the tripod that came cracked and broke easily, pity as it was a present for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Captain Blue Sky
Reviews.Content: I've been into photography as a hobby for sometime and wanted to buy my youngest daughter a complete DSLR package that she could use now and grow into.  The Canon EOS Rebel T3 package did not disappoint, and the price on Amazon was great!Although I'm a Nikon aficionado the Canon EOS Rebel T3 is absolutely perfect.  Flawless engineering, accurate light readings, fully automated functioning for aperture or shutter priority, built-in high intensity flash, takes precision still photographs, panoramic photos, and movies.  You are only limited by the size of the SD memory card you have loaded into the camera.  The accessories were great as well even though the tripod arrived with a broken attachment collar.  But it was apparent that it was broken upon bundling the tripod with the camera (not as a function of shipment).Very complete package!  For today and to grow into as her skills develop in photography!

Reviews.Title: Camera seems OK but the extra battery pack does not fit and I can't contact company
Reviews.Author: tim phelan
Reviews.Content: This camera is a good price and a nice model. It claims to include an extra battery pack but our extra will not fit the camera. How do you contact the company to get the correct battery?

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: Andre.
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, after reading reviews on product it was everything I expected. As I am a beginner in these types of camera easy to pick up and use. Cant wait to learn about more uses for the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Mena Aguilar
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, great seller, Fully recommended no matter if you are a begginner or a pro. The kit was excellent, fully functional.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera. Awesomer with this bundle.
Reviews.Author: managerjohn
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic deal for this camera and accessory package!Of course the camera itself is great and takes high quality images, as one would expect from a Canon DSLR. This is my first foray into manual/DSLR photography and this camera has blown away all expectations I had. It may be lacking some of the bells and whistles of higher end bodies, but it takes some amazing photos.One thing to take into account when reading the reviews for this particular bundle is that multiple sellers have this available. I purchased my bundle from Focus Camera. The card was a high speed Sony class 10. The camera bag is sturdy and well constructed. The extra battery isn't OEM but it has charged and worked just fine for me. The tripod isn't professional quality, but works well enough. All the other little things are just extras that you may or may not use. Either way, the price I paid for this bundle was about the same as the camera and lens kit by itself, so it really is a great value.Great camera, great bundle. If you choose to buy this, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Well worth it!
Reviews.Author: Buginface
Reviews.Content: I Bought as a gift for someone.  And she absolutely loves it. Great package for the money. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: So happy!!!
Reviews.Author: Zero's girl
Reviews.Content: This is my first SLR. It's my "Santa Gift" this year so I don't have it yet but I have used one or yearbook. My dad got me this for my college class and I couldn't be happier. :D can't wait to open it and take pictures :) yes I know it's weird but I'm naming it. I don't know what yet but I like to name stuff (my clarinet is Silver and my keyboard is Beethoven)  anyway. Great camera. Can't wait :D

Reviews.Title: Supber
Reviews.Author: Kenneth James
Reviews.Content: Excellent purchase and service as well.  Will continue to enjoy precious memories as we travel through our country and beyond.

Reviews.Title: couldn't ask for anything better
Reviews.Author: Marilynn
Reviews.Content: don't care what the Nikon users say. I love my Canon and will continue to purchase them. wonderful product and value

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great bundle!
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Great price for a great bundle! Looked around for a quality mid-priced DSLR for my wedding, honeymoon and upcoming vacation. This one fit the bill. Easy to use, lots of extras, and it's not too heavy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: A solid Camera
Reviews.Author: Julius Simone
Reviews.Content: Excellent digital camera. I have no regrets buying. It is a professional piece of equipment recommended for quality pictures. The package only adds good value.

Reviews.Title: great beginner camera
Reviews.Author: eelizoo
Reviews.Content: Its a great starter kit comes with all the essentials camera bag, sd card reader, hd cable, tripod and even an extra battery which I am sure will come in handy. The camera itself leaves a bit of a glossy finish but otherwise the photos still look great.Items were also shipped rather quickly definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Damian Nygaard "tr6canuck"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for product photography.  Great price for what you get.  You'd end up paying $450 plus tax just for the camera in a store plus another $150 for the extras.  Camera is lightweight.  Bag is well padded.  I like getting an extra battery.  Nothing worse than a dead battery and having to wait while it charges.  The battery does last a long time.  The only negative is the tripod.  It is cheap, flimsy and the some of the legs stick.  But overall well worth the price.*I bought a wired shutter release cable as I tend to shake the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Sharrilynn
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the camera and the bundle pkg. I am an amateur at photography and was looking for ease of use and reasonable price, this camera is both. I shopped around before buying and compared prices. The camera itself is about the same price as other sites but the bundle here was the best deal I found. Was very excited for all it included, everything was just as described, very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Cannon EOS Rebel
Reviews.Author: Keri Spivey
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with everything that was included and how well it was safely packaged! This was a gift for my daughter and so far she is loving it!

Reviews.Title: I Love this Camera kit
Reviews.Author: Elaine Landers
Reviews.Content: The rating is 5 starts due to A) quick delivery and B) everything truly worked and is still working. Also the face that the kit had all that one needs to keep their camera  well healthy.

Reviews.Title: Can't beat a Rebel
Reviews.Author: Workshop mpm
Reviews.Content: You simply can't beat a Canon Rebel in any grab and shoot category for the serious but not trained photographer.  Had a film Rebel many years ago - left and went to other cameras - never satisfied.....glad I had the good sense to come back to Rebel.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for media program
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Harris
Reviews.Content: Purchased for School District.  I can only assume that all was okay with the purchase because I didn't hear any complaints.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Alicia Mattison
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to start up a part time photography business, and I absolutely love the camera and it takes excellent pictures.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my new Canon
Reviews.Author: M. Dunn
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace my Canon XS Rebel that took a recent swim in the ocean.  Slightly different but have been using it and really like the results.  Easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Bundle was everything I expected!!
Reviews.Author: K. Dowd
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love the Canon bundle I ordered. All the little accessories and software was a great addition to the camera and lense.  The bag is very nice and holds everything it came with. Except the tripod and software of course! Would recommend this bundle to anyone!!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: judy Clark
Reviews.Content: Wow this camera is great and such a good price with so many extras ! I have been wanting this camera for years.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: kassidy b.
Reviews.Content: Awesome products!! Great shipping! I highly recommend to anyone who is starting their photography career!! Also, great information is included with the video!

Reviews.Title: Present for my wife
Reviews.Author: rflafond
Reviews.Content: I got this package as a birthday present for my wife and so far (it's been 3 weeks), she loves it.  She's taken some amazing pictures and learning how to use the camera & software.  This package was the same price as the camera alone with the HD movie feature.  A friend who is an amateur photographer said we don't really need that feature, especially since this is really a "starter" camera.

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera; great accessories.
Reviews.Author: Nhampton
Reviews.Content: I have used this camera at work and was very pleased with the results. Asked some professional photographer friends about this offer -- they were very impressed and encouraged me to buy! Everything was delivered just as promised. This is a lot of stuff for the price!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Urszula
Reviews.Content: This camera is cool and I am begginer so for me is very nice, not too heavy so far I can notice only positive acpects.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Judi Morgan
Reviews.Content: Ordered this camera as my Mother's Day/Birthday Gift this year.  Still learning to use it -- but so far, I love the quality of the pics.

Reviews.Title: Like it
Reviews.Author: Noel
Reviews.Content: It's a really good camera and it's just enough for my very first one of this kind. I recommend it and its accessories of the kit

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customers
Reviews.Author: Itay  Reshef
Reviews.Content: Great product, great service! We were very satisfied .The value for money was great, camera of course is terrific and the edditional accessories are a wonderful addition to the package

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: It's amazing camera I enjoy it very good pictures I used it to take pictures and the pictures turn out perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Togaloaf
Reviews.Content: Amazing how much extra stuff you get in this package when at any other camera shop you'd spend just as much for only the camera body. Everything works great. Love the camera.

Reviews.Title: Everything is great!
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn "Kait"
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much! Definetly worth the price for juse the camera even if you dont need all the extras they are nice to have. And shipping was FAST!

Reviews.Title: It came with everything! and my daughter loves it.
Reviews.Author: Catherine Tarbell ""Trixie" Belden Kate"
Reviews.Content: My 15 year old daughter worked for months to buy this setup and it does NOT disappoint.  The pictures are great and she can't wait to get some additional lenses.  I think this is a fantastic starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Bucksreview
Reviews.Content: Camera was as-advertised.  Thanks for a quality camera at a reasonable price.I would recommend this package to others.  Arrived timely.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Tyrel Johnson
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for the price. It was delivered on time with all the items listed. I dont have anything bad to say about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Really nice camera
Reviews.Author: Kim Mccartney "Cactus Dave"
Reviews.Content: We love the camera and it takes beautiful photos and videos.  We would recommend it to anyone who wants a good camera in the medium to lower price ranges.

Reviews.Title: Accurate
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with the product. I read the reviews, and had mixed feelings in the beginning and decided to take a chance. To purchase a camera with accessories for that price is unheard of. I received my package on time in excellent condition.  I'm happy I took a chance with focus camera and will order again from them.

Reviews.Title: Love this deal!
Reviews.Author: Melissa Singleton
Reviews.Content: Was exactly as advertised and great deal for the product you receive! Would recomment to anyone who is a beginner photographer

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect
Reviews.Author: Sports Mom
Reviews.Content: This camer is great for the beginner. The only thing that would make the kit perfect is a zoom lens. Great acrion shots. Battery life is awesome.

Reviews.Title: very good camera
Reviews.Author: M. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: i loved all the accessories and the price offered. i am making use of it and enjoying it as an apprentice!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: PAPER DOLL LADY
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal . Everything I wanted in a camera, and fun items. The case is perfect for all three of my cameras when you remove the partitions. The photos look professional. Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Stephen Bradner
Reviews.Content: Everything was exactly as advertised and shipped super fast. I am pleased with the quality of all the products and the camera is obviously an awesome camera. This price beat any that I found.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Dario
Reviews.Content: This is one of the occasions that I am very happy to purchase these items and services that help make my life and my family a very pleasant and comfortable, thanks for your support .

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and accessory kit for my 13 year old daughter. We couldn't be happier. Amazing camera and great value when buying this as a package. Aloha, Evan

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: L. R. Miller
Reviews.Content: So far, I am pleased with this camera.  I am still learning how to use it though.  It is more involved than the Coolpix that I have but it is a much higher quality camera.  I use this camera to photograph things that I am looking at under the microscope.  I purchased a separate lens attachment specifically for the microscope and the photos have been great.  There were lots of "extras" that came with this camera and I have not used all of those yet but it was a nice package for the price.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Nathalie Jones
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love ALL of my products.I can't put it down and it makes me very happy! I am excited that I can capture photos of my children and have great quality.

Reviews.Title: totally satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Hoa Nguyen
Reviews.Content: this is a really good stuff for a beginner. I love the camera as well as all things included in the package.This is a highly recommended seller.

Reviews.Title: Camara with kit
Reviews.Author: dmadriz
Reviews.Content: This was a great deal.I am more than happy with this purchase.All the products included in the package are worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: GREAT GREAT camera!!!
Reviews.Author: asgilmore
Reviews.Content: We purchased this as a Christmas present to ourselves and love it more and more every time we use it!!!  The picture quality is amazing and the camera itself is very easy to use/master!  I love that it also came with all the extras .. GREAT price!!

Reviews.Title: fun!
Reviews.Author: irene estrada
Reviews.Content: equipment works well, I just wish the tripod was more strudy. Video helped me understand all of the camer's capabilities. So far no complaints with my camera at all. I love the quality of photoes it takes compared to just point-and-shoot.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T3
Reviews.Author: Alchemist8
Reviews.Content: Love all that came with this.  Great price and lots of extras.  Used the camera on graduation day for my daughter and handles like my old 35 mm film cameras but with lots of extras.  I would recommend this camera for those taking the next step from a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: WHAT A GREAT DEAL!!!
Reviews.Author: Jenifer C.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is a great price and even included some things that I really didn't realize came with the package, such as the extra battery.  I am not a professional photographer, but I feel that this camera makes it easy to understand how to take great more professional like photos.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures
Reviews.Author: Reese
Reviews.Content: My pictures are turning out great with this camera which is quite a feat since I really do not know much about photography. I had everything set up and was snapping pictures within minutes of the battery charging. I decided to get a better camera than my iphone since a customer stated that my products are "way cooler" in real life than on my website. I even did a video if you want to check out the pictures and video I did with this camera you can see them at [...]

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: CAROLYN B.
Reviews.Content: The camera and kit was everything I expected and then some.  This is a good camera for beginners in that it explains all the functions.  I am really enjoying the quality of the photos that I have been taking.

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: cdk
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my daughter for her college graduation present.  It arrived as indicated when ordered and we used it to take her graduation day pictures.  The pictures are very good.  We are very pleased with all the accessories and camera.

Reviews.Title: Again
Reviews.Author: benzido
Reviews.Content: i did another bundle review and still stand by it. just buy everything individually. this bundle was better than the other i tried but just spend the money on each item individually and on good HQ products

Reviews.Title: Great price and great package deal!
Reviews.Author: mgraves13
Reviews.Content: I got quality name-brand accessories with my camera and everything has held up great so far. This was an awesome deal for everything included!

Reviews.Title: Such a good buy
Reviews.Author: Donna Hayden
Reviews.Content: Everything was shipped as the picture and description promised. Everything I needed to get my start. The bag is roomy and nice.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Great kit which really makes it a great value.  The delivery was super fast! Plus the EOS Rebel T3 is great, I have one and got the same one for my sister!

Reviews.Title: new canon
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: Wonderful package with all needed accessories.  The lenses from my Canon film camera that I loved fit this one.  No need to run out and buy a memory card and extra batteries.  Everythng is there.  Despite reviews I found the case adequate.  The DVD for camera use is good although repetitive.  The tripod is not as sturdy as one I already have but overall a great buy

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Deal!
Reviews.Author: Charles Malenfant
Reviews.Content: This was such a fantastic deal we couldn't pass it up! A great value for all the extra's! We are extremely glad to have this for our documentation dept.

Reviews.Title: Just awesome
Reviews.Author: J. Kelly "Preserve wildlife and pickle a squi...
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife. She loves it and after a few minutes with the manual was taking great pictures with auto, which focuses and does all the work for you. Haven't tried the tripod yet. Everything arrived exactly as stated. The item was shipped good no damage. If you buy this item I think you will be very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Stevie74
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for novice photographers. It's easy to use, plus I was able to apply my old 75-300 mm lens to it with no problem.  I'm recently expecting my first child and can't to take lots of baby photos with it.

Reviews.Title: great beginners camera
Reviews.Author: Prime Advocate "singldiva"
Reviews.Content: I LOVE taking photos and with this camera, I never take a bad shot!It works wonders for my ego. All ofthe equipment is an added bonus to the camera. I haven't used the tripod yet, but the camera case comes in very handy with all of the extra litte pockets. I can take everything in that bag!Very pleased

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Fantastic
Reviews.Author: GiaMarie
Reviews.Content: I have only ever owned little point and shoot cameras so this is a huge upgrade for me. I don't know anything about aperture or frame rates. All I know is that it takes FAST, beautiful pictures! I don't know how they offered such a huge bundle with it. The bundle alone looks to cost at least a couple hundred dollars. Everything in it is fantastic. My camera bag was the one pictured. It is spacious and sturdy. The items came in a huge box with everything packaged separately. So many things that it took me a good hour to go through it all. Lots of little books on how to get started taking great pictures. The tripod is great. My only complaint is that the strap on the tripod bag is a little chewed up. The camera came with a rechargeable battery and the bundle came with one too so I will always have one waiting. So happy with this purchase. Eventually I will get to know all of the bells and whistles of the Rebel, but for now I'm having a blast blinding my family and pets several times a day.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: qibn
Reviews.Content: Item was as explained . All of the items was there and worked properly and still working perfectly  good all around purchase

Reviews.Title: Excellent product !!!
Reviews.Author: Jose Blanco (jlbje2003)
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, my sincerest congratulations to you and your team. My daughter is very happy with his camera. Really all very complete and I recommend.Thanks you ....

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: andre
Reviews.Content: Great camera, all materials were fine.  The bag wasn't top quality as I would like it but overall buy was excellent!

Reviews.Title: Muy Buen Producto
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Colina
Reviews.Content: Quede muy satisfecho con toda la mercancía, llego en perfecto estado, 100% los recomiendo y la entrega fue a tiempo!

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!!!
Reviews.Author: andre mayhew
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and kit to upgrade from my other digital cameras. I actually love this camera and the features.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic buy!
Reviews.Author: Ann Frailey
Reviews.Content: This is by far and away the best camera I ever owned.  It came complete with everything a person with an eye for a picture could want including instructional manuals, creative photo idea suggestions, and instructional videos.  The camera works perfectly and takes beautiful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Easy beginner SLR
Reviews.Author: KMart
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for beginners.  I didn't know much about it in the beginning and even my point and shoots look fabulous!

Reviews.Title: gran kit
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: este es un muy buen kit para todo el q inicia en el mundo de la fotografia y en la fotografia profesional principalmente

Reviews.Title: LOVE!!!
Reviews.Author: kace810
Reviews.Content: Everything was there, what a package. The price for this was cheaper than Best Buy for just the camera alone! Total bargain, what else can I say.

Reviews.Title: Great Item
Reviews.Author: preezy666
Reviews.Content: This is my first "high-tech" camera and I have to say I am so happy. I've had practice with my friend's camera and fell in love. This package is worth the money. Many people have been saying negative things about the bag saying everything doesn't fit, but I had no problems. Everything fits perfectly and makes travel a breeze. If your thinking about buying this bundle DO NOT hesitate it's worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: dec mommy "E Wood"
Reviews.Content: I just got this yesterday and absolutely love it.  So far it's taken really nice pictures and I know will make a great starter camera. The camera case is actually a great size and can fit quite a bit in it.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: debra
Reviews.Content: this is my first didital camera and although I first found it difficult to understand all the features once I got the hand of things  I just love everything abought it

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: knj26
Reviews.Content: I got this camera bundle for a steal, in my opinion. It's my first DSLR and it is so much easier to use than the Nikon D90 I practiced with before deciding to get a DSLR camera. It came with everything described, except the memory card. The manufacturer was very easy to converse with and I even got $20 back from my purchase to go toward a memory card. I got one for Christmas, so it wasn't necessary. Also, it took a week to eventually ship out. It came from New York, and I live in Arizona, so I understand why it took another week to get here. Not sure why the ship date was so late. Overall, this was a great deal! Love my camera!

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera package
Reviews.Author: by Felicitas noel
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase and the first one that I had actually made on line. She uses he camera on a daily basis and is now on the school committee. Thanks so much for making great deals available there on your site. I will continue to shop for deals such as these.

Reviews.Title: Everything You Need
Reviews.Author: DC Resident
Reviews.Content: I got this package for my partner who has never taken a photography class, but has intuitively taken great photos with other DSLR cameras. She is very happy with everything and this camera will challenge her to take her nature photography to new levels. Can't wait to see the pictures! This package includes everything you need to get started right away taking pictures and experimenting with all the different modes.

Reviews.Title: Nice Slr but the case is to small
Reviews.Author: Brian Evans
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kit to get the camera bag and tripod mainly. For the few extra dollars I thought it would be worth it however the bag is CHEAP and to small for everything that is included. No room for extra lenses or anything else. If I was to do over I would not buy this kit filled with cheap stuff. Camera is great but kit isn't.

Reviews.Title: My daughter was so delighted when she received this as a Christmas present.
Reviews.Author: Karen White
Reviews.Content: The camera is great, but i was expecting the camera bag to be a Canon as well and it was not. The battery package was sliced opened, but everything was fine. The battery was not a Canon battery either. I just figured when I purchased this package it would be all Canon.

Reviews.Title: Definitely could have been better.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Lee
Reviews.Content: The biggest setback to this package was the broken tripod. Everything else was in fine, working shape, including the overall packaging. One of the tripod legs was missing bolts and would not stand up.Packaging on the cleaning kit was damaged and the cleaner fluid spilled out.Other than that everything came in about a week or so, and was in working condition.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal Great Price for a Perfect Camera.
Reviews.Author: trishanth gautam
Reviews.Content: I got into photography recently and started exploring the Art of photography, after buying this camera for such a Good Price i was happy, the Brand New Bundle is just awesome, i surely saved money, and very much satisfied with the Camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DWil
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera.  I researched several sites for days and decided this package was the best beginner package for me.  There are definitely other lenses I want, but will have to save $ for them. This bag is awesome it held everything that came with the package, plus our smaller camera and chargers and extra batteries - then it was all stolen from our vehicle.  When I went to replace it, I got the same camera and a similar package, but this exact one was unavailable.  Hate the bag that came with the newer one.  Really miss this one.  The only complaint was the tripod was broken  upon arrival.  As other reviews have stated, the tripod is not what made me decide on the package so I tried to fix it, didn't work, so I just threw it away.

Reviews.Title: Great beginners camera
Reviews.Author: Savannah Girl
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 16 yr.old daughter.  She is really interested into photography and truly loves this camera.  All the extras made it even more of a deal.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: coffeefor3
Reviews.Content: love the pictures it takes,  fast, clean, sharp color, not great zoom but I knew that before buying the camera. Body DOES NOT feel cheap or breakable to me.

Reviews.Title: My First DSLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Gail R. Kulp
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for myself as an early Christmas present and it is my first attempt at a DSLR camera. I've previously owned other Canon cameras and am familiar with the brand and functions, but this camera is a serious upgrade from my other cameras. The kit came with a tripod (which I haven't opened or tried yet) and a 16 GB memory card as well as a really nice camera bag. I can't wait to read through the manual and watch the DVD so that I can learn all the special features that this camera has.

Reviews.Title: Defective right out of the box
Reviews.Author: Mr. Richards
Reviews.Content: Sad that something this expensive did not work right at all. Repeated error codes showed up upon initial use, and had to go online to follow "repair" and reset instructions. Then the snapshot view screen failed on the very next day, with purple and pink lines blurring the screen, making taking pictures impossible. Kudos to Amazon for full refund and easy UPS pickup for the return process. Would not recommend this camera, though, and will be looking for a different brand going forward.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was extremely pleased with everything about the camera, accessories and the service I would highly recommended this to others!

Reviews.Title: I would give it a 5 start but
Reviews.Author: SAMUEL SINGH
Reviews.Content: I would give it a 5 start but in order to use it, it take a lil bit of playing around with to understand functions other than that its great.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this kit !
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera case had mold all over it and it stinks awful, it is wrapped in the original package though. I returned the case right away and it has been more than a month waiting for any response on that issue other than standard replies. Totally disappointed by Amazon on this one. It looks like their customer service is getting worse to my surprise. I am giving up waiting for any refund or return of the camera case and will buy myself.The extra battery is supposed to be 1500mAh vs 860mAh (the original Canon in the camera box), but it lasts less than the original canon battery.The camera,the memory card and the card reader are OK, I have not tested the cable yet.The tripod is very cheap and is not actually for this camera although it works. The issue is that the tripod has a pin which pops up and is supposed to go into a hole in the camera, but this Canon camera doesn't have a pinhole so you have to tighten the screw tight so that the pin is actually depressed enough and the camera is compressing the rubber pad around it. The pin this way will scratch the camera sticker on the bottom and eventually leave a dent, if not damage the print.Bottom line is I would not recommend you this kit. You are better off buying the items as separate.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: TCalvert
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a beginner like myself.  I am very pleased with how easy it is to learn, and the photographs are excellent!!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent bundle and pricing
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Excellent bundle - lowest price I could find, and it included more little goodies than advertised. For a non-professional, this camera would seem to be more than anyone could possibly desire. I didn't need the tripod, and haven't even looked at it, but the bundle price was as low as B&H;'s price for the camera alone, so everything else was a gimme. Add in free Prime shipping, and I'm a happy snapper!

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: young
Reviews.Content: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera  very good i like it . it suits the new guy

Reviews.Title: The camera is awesome.
Reviews.Author: Constantino Apostolou
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is awesome, the tripod is of good quality and the bag as well. The only reason I'm putting three stars on this on is because I found some of the packages inside open. For example the Memory Card to USB drive was not in its package. And on the camera, which as I said was amazing, I found a dead pixel. Overall it's a good choice and got it before I expected it to arrive.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Tony F
Reviews.Content: Gift for my daughter studying art history. All the accessories she required were in the kit. Easy to use beginner SRL

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: juan
Reviews.Content: all good, very complete package comes with lots of accessories, is offering advertising, is very good camera, widely recommended .

Reviews.Title: Super cool!!
Reviews.Author: Sachin Balyaya
Reviews.Content: This also i bought an year back and its right time for feedback.All in all good camera. I love this.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase!
Reviews.Author: Viviana Goldman
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I expected.Easy to use, and excellent pictures can be taken with it.All my daughters are already using it!

Reviews.Title: Good starter kit
Reviews.Author: Javier De Solminihac
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my sister in law And it came all The things You will Need to start taking photos!!!I recomend it

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: mclaudia
Reviews.Content: Loved everything I got for the price.. Can't beat it!!! I absolutely love my camera and every accessory that came with it...

Reviews.Title: Very Fast Shipping!
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this less than a week before Christmas, and was really hoping to get it on time, but didn't want to pay the extra money for express shipping. I was thrilled when it arrived the day before Christmas Eve., I couldn't ask for any better timing! The camera kit has everything you need to get out there and take photos!

Reviews.Title: Not to shabby!
Reviews.Author: Jabrell Canteen
Reviews.Content: When I received my package, everything is as it said it was.Pros:great camera for those who are just starting out in the photo world such as myself.very easy to get acclimated to.camera controls are simple.the quick start guide that comes with the camera breaks everything down quickly and easily.it also came with a cd rom for more in depth instructions.the bundle deal includes various items that I find myself using on a day to day basisCons:there aren't many down sides to this bundle with the exception of 2 things. one the photo book that is shown in the picture never came to me, and the carrying case that was given to me was a used one. these are very minor things that just irritated me.all in all the camera is great. puts out great quality photos and the various features such as black and white photos or sepia help spark creativity in anyone that holds it.I love this camera and recommend it to any beginner looking for something decent to start off with.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel
Reviews.Author: Jason E. Herdering "jayering"
Reviews.Content: This was a very good packaged deal. Everything was just at it was described. This is a very good camera that takes amazing pictures. You can not beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: great camera canon eos t3 rebel
Reviews.Author: Terri Johnson
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for beginner to move forward. great price. easy to use right out of box. amazon had best price and there are lots of different lens and extra things to order

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: megaman2u
Reviews.Content: this camera is amazing i love it everything came ontime and works perfect if you need to get a camera with great quality and a cheap price, look no further

Reviews.Title: Canon T3 rebel
Reviews.Author: Lisa Frisino
Reviews.Content: The T3 rebel is the bottom line camera for Canon.It is the beginners starter. I bought it 6 months ago. The T2i is an older camera but so much higher quality. I feel that anyone that buys the T3 will be extremely disappointed after a short time. To get an off camera flash or a flash that goes on top of the camera will find that the only one that will work costs $600 while one for the T2i costs $250. T3 should be removed from all shelves and discontinued in my oppinion.

Reviews.Title: This was a gift for a very dear friend
Reviews.Author: Frog Lady
Reviews.Content: I gave this package  to a very close and dear friend. She loves it and have been enjoying taking pictures.

Reviews.Title: camera damaged
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: I was very excited to open my birthday gift from my husband at my b-day party and all my friends and family because its my wish to have canon DSLR,I was very excited to try, so we turn on  the camera very sad and disappointed because the camera is broke, first we heard is the very loud fluttering noise, its unbelievable. You cant even take a picture, even just to ON/OFF the camera still doing the fluttering noise. Seller need to check their items before sending to the buyers!Absolutely will return back and get the money back!What a waste of time and a bad birthday surprised ever!

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging - Body (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E10 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Focus Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap
Focus Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
